root.name: Big Challenge! Judo Senshuken
root.description: OverviewBig Challenge! Judo Senshuken (Championship) is a Judo-themed competitive sports game where the object is to defeat the opponent using legal Judo moves. This involves a lot of grapples, pins and throws. Defeating one opponent allows the player to work their way up the tournament ranks to progressively tougher foes.
